subject: Re: What's the deal with the frog?
msgSnippet: ... Oh, that s no ordinary frog.  That s Blinky.  He s actually an albino frog basking in the reflective glow of a green bar.  Notice how he s poised ready to
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Kyle Gabhart <kylegabhart@y...>"
<kylegabhart@y...> wrote:

> I love JUnit. It's a great testing framework. What is the deal
> though with the frog and the slogan - "keep the bar green to keep the
> code clean..."?

Oh, that's no ordinary frog. That's Blinky. He's actually an albino
frog basking in the reflective glow of a green bar. Notice how he's
poised ready to spring into action at any moment, just like the code
that passed the test. Indeed, it's so clean that it's just waiting to
be easily extended if need be.

Ribbit!

;-)

Mike

--
